dublin_core.dcvalue: mHero A Mobile Platform for Health Workers Amid the Ebola Outbreak and Beyond With support from K4Health IntraHealth International developed a short animated video about mHero a mobile health application that facilitates two way communication for ministries of health and health workers This SMS based platform extends and enhances existing national health information systems to get critical knowledge to health workers in real time via their mobile phones Initially designed and implemented in Liberia mHero was used during the Ebola crisis to communicate with health workers and verify their locations
